response_text: This class was a stellar deep dive into skills I thought I had already acquired. I learned so much about how to write beautifully, how to tell someone's story in a way that does them justice, and how to phrase ideas in unique ways. On top of beautiful writing skills, I learned a lot about how to critique and take criticism. I loved this class and I can confidently say I have learned the most in this once-a-week seminar compared to any other class at Duke.
